data.summary: Created comprehensive test suite for phase-2-schemas covering: (1) StepTypeSchema validation with all 10 types, invalid rejection, default='standard'. (2) Step object schema integration with backwards compatibility. (3) memory_steps insert action with at_index and step parameters. (4) memory_steps delete action with step_index. (5) memory_plan delete action with confirm safety parameter. (6) memory_plan consolidate action with step_indices and consolidated_task. Tests NOT run yet - will execute in RUN mode after all phases complete.
